resources.string: This is the first paragraph of text.It describes the beginning of the story or the main information to be presented.
Next, the second paragraph is presented. This can expand on the main idea, add details, or a relevant anecdote.
The third and final paragraph concludes the section, summarizing key points or providing a call to action.

This Unit is responsible for providing forensic medical expertise, issuing reports and opinions on the assessment of bodily harm, date and cause of death, exhumations and expertise related to medical liability in criminal, civil and administrative matters.

It offers advisory services (reports, opinions, studies, regulatory projects and regulatory compliance programmes) to professionals and public and private entities in the field of criminology and criminal sciences. It also offers specialised training on demand for all institutions and professionals involved or interested in these areas.
